acid_storms.description: Corrosive acid storms temporarily reduce armor effectiveness for both enemy and friendly units.
acid_storms.name: Acid Storms

blizzards.description: Intense blizzard reduce mobility and moderately reduce visibility for both enemy and friendly units.
blizzards.name: Blizzards

extreme_cold.description: Icy temperatures reduce rate of fire and delay heat buildup in weapons.
extreme_cold.name: Extreme Cold

fire_tornadoes.description: Planet is ravaged by deadly fire tornadoes.
fire_tornadoes.name: Fire Tornadoes

intense_heat.description: High temperatures increase stamina drain and speed up heat buildup in weapons.
intense_heat.name: Intense Heat

meteor_storms.description: Meteors impact the surface causing massive damage.
meteor_storms.name: Meteor Storms

none.description: This planet's environment is not yet known, or has no environmental modifiers.
none.name: None

normal_temp.description: Average temperatures convey no significant change to weapons or stamina.
normal_temp.name: Normal Temperature

sandstorms.description: Dense sandstorms reduce mobility and greatly reduce visibility for both enemy and friendly units.
sandstorms.name: Sandstorms

thick_fog.description: Dense fog lightly reduce visibility for both enemy and friendly units.
thick_fog.name: Thick Fog

tremors.description: Frequent earthquakes stun players and enemies alike.
tremors.name: Tremors

volcanic_activity.description: Volcanoes throw burning rocks around this planet.
volcanic_activity.name: Volcanic Activity
